user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon shopping cart page with two items listed. The subtotal is $219.79, and it includes an LG UltraGear Gaming Monitor for $199.99 and a MacBook Pro case for $19.80. Options to proceed to checkout or save items for later are available. There is also an option to send the items as a gift. The page is set to deliver to the Netherlands.
